mapper.select: select * from tb_class_group_list where group_no = #{groupNo} order by list_order
select * from tb_class_group_list_card order by card_order
select m.*, u.name from tb_class_group_member m, tb_user u where m.group_member_id = u.id and m.group_no = #{groupNo} order by m.group_member_order
select m.*, g.name from tb_class_group_member m inner join tb_user g on m.group_member_id = g.id order by m.group_no, m.group_member_order
select u.* from tb_class_group u, tb_class_group_member g where u.group_no = g.group_no and g.group_member_id = #{groupMemberId}
select m.*, u.name, u.phone, u.addr, u.profile_path from tb_class_group_member m, tb_user u where m.group_member_id = u.id and m.group_no = #{groupNo}
